author: Purple Violin

review: I cast using my iPhone, and it is very convenient. I don't have to worry about a remote, and it is simple to search for what I want to watch. The only complaint I have is that sometimes it takes a while for my phone to find the Chromecast on my WiFi, so pausing can be problematic. I often have to reboot an app in order to pause. For the price, I am extremely satisfied. I only wish there were a more streamlined way to pause/play what I am watching. Also, as of now there is no support for Amazon Instant video. It would be a fantastic improvement if that were added.

review: Didn't like it.  Purchased it for my wife who uses her Ipad to watch old episodes of various shows.  The video stream kept buffering making it frustrating to watch her shows on the tv.  She went back to watching them only on her Ipad and had no problems there.  Keep your money and wait for the next evolution.  Hopefully they'll iron out the remaining wrinkles.
